info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 5:53PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hudson, southeastern Union, southeastern Bergen, southeastern Essex, southern Westchester, Queens, Bronx, Richmond, Kings and New York (Manhattan) Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 553 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bergenfield, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newark, Jersey City, Jamaica, Yonkers, Elizabeth, Flatbush, Flushing, Bayonne, Mott Haven, Hoboken, East Tremont, Hackensack, Bergenfield, Lyndhurst and Rutherford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
